dcterms:creator: Alexey Dosovitskiy
German Ros
Felipe Codevilla
Antonio Lopez
Vladlen Koltun
dcterms:description: An open urban driving simulator that provides a platform for testing autonomous driving algorithms in various scenarios.
dcterms:title: CARLA dataset

dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset generated using Blender, featuring a stationary blue cube (ego) and a red cylinder (actor) that may or may not be present.
dcterms:title: Blender synthetic dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset simulating a single ego vehicle positioned at a T-intersection with an actor vehicle traversing the crossing along a predefined trajectory.
dcterms:title: Single-Scene Approaching Intersection

dcterms:description: An extended scenario of the single-scene approach, introducing state uncertainty by making the existence of the actor vehicle probabilistic.
dcterms:title: Multi-Scene Approaching Intersection

dcterms:description: A dataset simulating a multi-actor setting at an intersection with partial occlusions, where the second approaching actor has variable speed.
dcterms:title: Multi-Scene Two Lane Merge
